00044 Url::Url(const string& urlString) throw (MalformedUrlException)
00045 : string(normalize(urlString))
00046 {
00047     checkUrlString(urlString);
00048 }
00049 
00050 Url::Url(const char* urlString) throw (MalformedUrlException)
00051 : string(normalize(string(urlString)))
00052 {
00053     checkUrlString(string(urlString));
00054 }
00055 
00056 Url& Url::operator=(const Url& url) throw (MalformedUrlException)
00057 {
00058     checkUrlString(url);
00059     string::operator=(normalize((const string&) url));
00060     return *this;
00061 }
00062 
00063 Url Url::contextualize(const string& context) const throw (MalformedUrlException)
00064 {
00065     DOUT("Url to contextualize: '%s'; context: '%s'", this->c_str(), context.c_str());
00066     if (isComplete()) return *this;
00067     if (isAbsolute() && context.substr(0, 6) != "rdk://") return *this;
00068     if (substr(0, 2) != "..") {
00069         if (isAbsolute()) {
00070             return normalize(context.substr(0, context.find_first_of("/", 6)) + *this);
00071         }
00072         else return (context == "" ? *this : 
00073                              Url(context + "/" + this->c_str()) );
00074     }
00075     else {
00076         bool contextWasAbsolute = context[0] == '/';
00077         string prefix = context.substr(0, 6) == "rdk://" ? "rdk://" : "";
00078         string ctxt = context.substr(prefix.size());
00079         vector<string> vctxt = tokenize(ctxt, "/");
00080         vector<string> vpath = tokenize(*this, "/");
00081         unsigned int c;
00082         for (c = 0; c < vpath.size() && vpath[c] == ".."; c++) ;
00083         if (c > vctxt.size() - (prefix == "" ? 0 : 1))
00084             throw MalformedUrlException("Too many \"..\" (context: '" 
00085                 + context + "', path: '" + *this + "')");
00086         string ret = prefix + (contextWasAbsolute ? "/" : "");
00087         for (size_t i = 0; i < vctxt.size() - c; i++) ret += vctxt[i] + "/";
00088         for (size_t i = c; i < vpath.size(); i++) ret += vpath[i] + "/";
00089         return ret.substr(0, ret.size() - 1);
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 Url Url::getRelativeUrl(unsigned int partsToSkip) const
00094 {
00095     string path = getPath();
00096     if (path[0] != '/') path = "/" + path;  // make it absolute
00097     vector<string> vc = tokenize(path, "/");
00098     string r = "";
00099     for (size_t i = partsToSkip; i < vc.size(); i++) r = r + vc[i] + "/";
00100     r = r.substr(0, r.size() - 1);
00101     return r;
00102 }
00103 
00104 string Url::getHost() const
00105 {
00106     if (!isComplete()) return "";
00107     return substr(6, find_first_of("/", 6) - 6);
00108 }
00109 
00110 string Url::getPath() const
00111 {
00112     if (!isComplete()) return *this;
00113     return substr(6 + getHost().size());
00114 }
00115 
00116 void Url::checkUrlString(const string& /*urlString*/) throw (MalformedUrlException) { }
00117 
00118 string Url::normalize(string s)
00119 {
00120     string r = "";
00121     string prefix = s.substr(0, 6) == "rdk://" ? "rdk://" : "";
00122     s = s.substr(prefix.size());
00123     bool slash = false;
00124     for (size_t i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
00125         if (s[i] == '/') slash = true;
00126         else {
00127             if (slash) { r += "/"; slash = false; }
00128             r += s[i];
00129         }
00130     }
00131     return prefix + r;
00132 }
00133 
00134 int Url::getLevel() const
00135 {
00136     if (isRelative()) return -1;
00137     int l = 0;
00138     for (size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++) {
00139         if (operator[](i) == '/') l++;
00140     }
00141     if (isComplete()) l-=2;
00142     return l;
00143 }
